definition[0]: giving a lot of time, effort, or attention to one particular thing
example[0]: A lot of the younger students don’t seem to be politically oriented at all.
example[2]: The country’s economy is export oriented.
definition[1]: if something is market-oriented, customer-oriented etc, it is developed or done to meet the market’s or the customer’s needs
example[3]: The country is moving toward a market-oriented economic model.
